recipesJson.name: Fig Newton v1
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: This is my take on a fig newton. Its not 100% accurate but really tasty if you like fig and buttery cookies. I haven't been able to nail down that really dense texture but this is pretty close.

reviews.text: This is not bad, had to steep it for a month to mellow out the sharpness of the fig.
Maybe this is not accurate, but it is really delicious and not the same profile. I'm so bored of all these strawberry&cream. Thank you @mlnikon for this recipe
